title: please let me know the fonts !!! urgent
author: keyur_foryou

comments.content: It looks like a badly rendered **[Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824145915/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Arial%20-%20Regular&fid=39c85868b4da84331551eae5e6d98715&fsize=60&text=SHRI%20NYLON%20TRADERS&wrap=2)**
